short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IDmelon Provisioning empowers admins of an organization to streamline FIDO2 credential setup for employees.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In today's dynamic business environment, streamlining application provisioning for both existing and new employees is crucial. This ensures immediate or day-one access, maximizing productivity. With IDmelon Provisioning, say goodbye to manual provisioning and empower your users from day one. Eliminate the burden from HR and IT departments â€“ no admin or user involvement is required. Users gain immediate access without waiting, training headaches, or delays. This frees up valuable time for your team to focus on strategic initiatives. 
For more information, see our Privacy Policy. https://idmelon.com/privacy-policy
